titleStmt.title: The true discripcion of a childe with ruffes borne in the parish of Micheham in the cou[n]tie of Surrey in the yeere of our Lord. M.D.LXvi
titleStmt.author: H. B., fl. 1566.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Allde and Richarde Iohnes and are to be solde at the long shop adioining vnto S. Mildreds Churche in the Pultrie and at the litle shop adioining to the northwest doore of Paules Churche,
publicationStmt.date: Anno domini. M.D.Lxvi. the .xx. of August [1566]

notesStmt.note: Woodcut illustration with letterpress prose description and with verses.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the litle shop adioining to the northwest doore of Paules Churche
the long shop adioining vnto S. Mildreds Churche in the Pultrie
